{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04125v1", "title": "Non-inner automorphisms of order $p$ in finite $p$-groups admitting
  cyclic center", "summary": "Let $G$ be a finite non-abelian $p$-group admitting cyclic center and $p$ be
an odd prime. In this paper, we prove that if
$C_{G}(Z(\gamma_{3}(G)G^{p}))\nleqslant\gamma_{3}(G)G^{p}$, then $G$ has a
non-inner automorphism of order $p$.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR", "published": "2025-05-07T04:44:47Z"}
